currently this class is only covered by integration tests unit tests are needed
we have a bunch of classes named utils making it difficult to tell which utils class is being referenced when reading code
it would be better to clarify the name as webutils
should also be renamed to
currently the local tachyon cluster has a huge start method and is very difficult to follow
we should improve the readability of the code by separating logic into methods and adding documentation when appropriate
there may also be unnecessary logic that can be removed
it seems like the ramdisk provisioned on osx is a few mb smaller than it should be causing out of space errors when the worker thinks it should still have some space left
